name: Retro Runner
description:
Press SPACE to jump. Tap quickly to do a small jump.

--------------

The gaming history runner, from 1970 to 2000, from Pong to Tetris.

Submission for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game jam.

Enjoy :) Let me know how far you get!

--------------

Game was previously called Y5K.

*Shoutout to Ofihombre for the better description.
